title: BrucePac Recalls Ready-To-Eat Meat and Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: Editor’s Note: October 17, 2024 – FSIS is working diligently to identify all recalled products that were distributed to consumers, including those purchased by schools. A preliminary list of schools that received products that include BrucePac recalled ready-to-eat (RTE) meat and poultry have been added...

establishment.name: BrucePac
activities: Certification - Export;  Meat Processing;  Poultry Processing
